text: William Franklin "Bill" Goodling (December 5, 1927 - September 17, 2017) was an American Republican politician. He was born in Loganville, Pennsylvania. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives from Pennsylvania's 19th congressional district from 1975 through 2001. At the time of his death, he was the Chairman of the Board of the Goodling Institute for Research in Family Literacy. Goodling died from complications of a cerebral aneurysm on September 17, 2017 in York, Pennsylvania at the age of 89.Bill Goodling, former Republican congressman for Adams, York Counties, dies at 89 ==References== ==Other websites== * *The Political Graveyard * * *The Goodling Institute *Bill Goodling's Congressional Votes at the Washington Post * official U.S. House website (archived) * Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from intracranial aneurysm Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: William F. Goodling
